entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port-Menier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:30 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Menier 03:00 AM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -1.4°C
Wind: SE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
